div.h2: WELCOME TO THE SHAKER REGIONAL SCHOOL DISTRICT
div.p:
Shaker Regional School District would like to welcome you to our website! Feel free to explore the web space by checking out some of our features including: calendars, news, department information, School Board documents, and more.
Subscribe to Twitter to receive updates on school and district information!

a.title: Click here for more information about school closure, remote learning, etc.

p.span: Thank you for visiting our website. I would like to draw your attention to a very important document, our Strategic Direction. Please click on the link to your right. This document outlines our beliefs, drives our decisions, and supports our mission: Engaging All Learners to Succeed in Their Ever-Changing World. Through many hours of hard work, a variety of stakeholders worked collaboratively to develop our guiding principles, core values, mission, and vision statements. Each vision statement (starting on page 16) is accompanied by several action strategies. These strategies outline our work for the next five years! I highly encourage you to take the time to read and develop an understanding of our school districts direction as outlined in this very important document. Please do not hesitate to contact me with any question or comments as you read through the details of this information.

div.span:
Michael J. Tursi
Superintendent of Schools
